past-work-data.title: Crown Shop
past-work-data.description: An e-commerce clothing website made by React by helping react-router, react-redux, scss, Firebase. users can sign in with their Google accounts with the help of Firebase Auth.  Note: this web app is not fully finished and responsive yet

past-work-data.title: Portfolio by Mehdi Karami
past-work-data.description: A portfolio React App, to showcase a developer's most recent works, Curriculum vitae, and skills. With the help of emailjs people can interact with the developer via the form available in the app.

past-work-data.title: Analog Clock by Mehdi Karami
past-work-data.description: A simple reusable Analog Clock React Component. A part of a series of projects belonging to an upcoming React UI Component library
